# Reference

<!-- DO NOT EDIT: This document was generated by Puppet Strings -->

## Table of Contents

### Resource types

* [`rpmkey`](#rpmkey): Define public GPG keys that should be part of the rpm keyring.

## Resource types

### <a name="rpmkey"></a>`rpmkey`

Define public GPG keys that should be part of the rpm
keyring.

#### Properties

The following properties are available in the `rpmkey` type.

##### `ensure`

Valid values: `present`, `absent`

The basic property that the resource should be in.

Default value: `present`

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `rpmkey` type.

* [`name`](#-rpmkey--name)
* [`provider`](#-rpmkey--provider)
* [`source`](#-rpmkey--source)

##### <a name="-rpmkey--name"></a>`name`

namevar

The name of the key. This is the keyID (in hex) in
uppercase.

##### <a name="-rpmkey--provider"></a>`provider`

The specific backend to use for this `rpmkey` resource. You will seldom need to specify this --- Puppet will usually
discover the appropriate provider for your platform.

##### <a name="-rpmkey--source"></a>`source`

The source of the public key if the key is not already imported.
